Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

These forums are now closed, but I have edited an old post to leave a "list" of Quest 5 games here for anyone who may be perusing an archive of these forums.

---
Today's top 5 Quest games (from the Top Rated games listing):
1. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ihxy6cuakkarclwoh2pwag/the-shack
2. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/w207ce4zekubenmwgss5pa/victorian-detective
3. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/gy39twq3puwfzr-jl6puda/the-zen-garden
4. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/iv6rcktu7eoajru0m9is5q/xanadu-the-worlds-only-hope-part-2-revenge
5. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/_tz-z3689ku5mhp_6gc7fw/guttersnipe-carnival-of-regrets

---
Some guy named Alex Warren made this Quest gamebook:
https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/7qpskitase20yvxfw5quqq/davyb

---
Here's a thread where XanMag (who was categorizing games at the time) listed his picks of the week a few times:
https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/vycfpbuzvusgpylwo4relg/this-weeks-picks

---
Quite a few people have praised this one: https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/vh_rnrkiqeshmt4zzmbmzg/a-stranger-unregarded

https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/games/topic/5740/a-stranger-unregarded

---
Text adventure games by NecroDeath: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/miyjcc_ft0kagw7ynwd4jw/necrodeath

Text adventure games by XanMag: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/emxhs1hs8uaib5hfblmp4a/xanmag

Text adventure games by DavyB: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/7qpskitase20yvxfw5quqq/davyb

Text adventure games by Father Thyme: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/nxo_r3mx-0eekggj0h99eq/father-thyme

Text adventure games (gamebooks) by peter123:https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/hkgmp72kkkwsghta2w22nq/peter123

Text adventure games by The Pixie: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/_o1rjdv47u2x-batbxe_tw/the-pixie

Text adventure games by Jay Nabonne: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/ucedmuk6fkoucle26trdoq/jay-nabonne

Text adventure games by OurJud: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/9dhLNmo6HUWpMnVSq_lX5w/ourjud

---
I'm sure I forgot some good ones.

---
Also, while I'm here... There is an old post here with a link to an article about Quest, but the link is no longer good.

https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/general/topic/3198/new-article-about-quest

At the time of writing this, that article can be read here:

https://web.archive.org/web/20121010023316/http://moonbooks.net/article/the-quest-for-modern-text-adventure-games/
Posts.HTML:
Hi,

These forums are now closed, but I have edited an old post to leave a "list" of Quest 5 games here for anyone who may be perusing an archive of these forums.

Today's top 5 Quest games (from the Top Rated games listing):

  1. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ihxy6cuakkarclwoh2pwag/the-shack
  2. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/w207ce4zekubenmwgss5pa/victorian-detective
  3. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/gy39twq3puwfzr-jl6puda/the-zen-garden
  4. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/iv6rcktu7eoajru0m9is5q/xanadu-the-worlds-only-hope-part-2-revenge
  5. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/_tz-z3689ku5mhp_6gc7fw/guttersnipe-carnival-of-regrets

Some guy named Alex Warren made this Quest gamebook:
https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/7qpskitase20yvxfw5quqq/davyb

Here's a thread where XanMag (who was categorizing games at the time) listed his picks of the week a few times:
https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/vycfpbuzvusgpylwo4relg/this-weeks-picks

Quite a few people have praised this one: https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/vh_rnrkiqeshmt4zzmbmzg/a-stranger-unregarded

https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/games/topic/5740/a-stranger-unregarded

Text adventure games by NecroDeath: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/miyjcc_ft0kagw7ynwd4jw/necrodeath

Text adventure games by XanMag: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/emxhs1hs8uaib5hfblmp4a/xanmag

Text adventure games by DavyB: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/7qpskitase20yvxfw5quqq/davyb

Text adventure games by Father Thyme: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/nxo_r3mx-0eekggj0h99eq/father-thyme

Text adventure games (gamebooks) by peter123:https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/hkgmp72kkkwsghta2w22nq/peter123

Text adventure games by The Pixie: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/_o1rjdv47u2x-batbxe_tw/the-pixie

Text adventure games by Jay Nabonne: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/ucedmuk6fkoucle26trdoq/jay-nabonne

Text adventure games by OurJud: https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/9dhLNmo6HUWpMnVSq_lX5w/ourjud

I'm sure I forgot some good ones.

Also, while I'm here... There is an old post here with a link to an article about Quest, but the link is no longer good.

https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/general/topic/3198/new-article-about-quest

At the time of writing this, that article can be read here:

https://web.archive.org/web/20121010023316/http://moonbooks.net/article/the-quest-for-modern-text-adventure-games/
